tool_description: Analyzes customer data to create detailed segments with price sensitivity, purchasing behavior, and promotional responsiveness profiles for targeted discount strategies.

customer_data_source.description: Path or identifier for customer data source

segmentation_criteria.description: Criteria for segmentation: demographics, behavior, value, recency, frequency

minimum_segment_size.description: Minimum number of customers per segment

lookback_period_days.description: Number of days to analyze for behavioral patterns

include_price_sensitivity.description: Whether to calculate price sensitivity metrics

error_messages: Invalid customer data source: Customer data source is not accessible or in wrong format.
Invalid segmentation criteria: Use valid criteria from [demographics, behavior, value, recency, frequency].
Insufficient data: Not enough customer data to create meaningful segments with specified minimum_segment_size.
Invalid lookback period: lookback_period_days must be between 30 and 1095 days.
Segmentation failed: Unable to create distinct segments with provided criteria and data.
usage: Provide customer_data_source and segmentation_criteria. Optionally adjust minimum_segment_size, lookback_period_days, and price sensitivity analysis. Returns detailed customer segments with promotional insights.

segment_sizes.description: Number of customers in each segment

price_sensitivity_scores.description: Price sensitivity scores for each segment (0-10 scale)

promotional_responsiveness.description: Historical response rates to promotions per segment

average_order_values.description: Average order value for each segment
